channel.title: root growth on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in root growth on funPlantGenes

item.title: ACS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C03G066100 Gene Symbol: ACS7 Gene Name: carboxylate synthase 7 Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: An allelic variant in the ACS7 gene promotes primary root growth in watermelon。 The ACS7 expression and ethylene levels in the primary root tips suggested that ethylene is a negative regulator of root elongation in watermelon.

item.title: ArPK
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g47780 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0693000 Gene Symbol: ArPK Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BIGE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb211050 Gene Symbol: BIGE1 Gene Name: Big embryo 1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: BnaA2.NIP5;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BraA02G0242800 Gene Symbol: BnaA2.NIP5 1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.title: BnaA3.NIP5;1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA03C0265800 Gene Symbol: BnaA3.NIP5;1 Gene Name: Genome: Darmor-bzh reference genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Specific and multiple-target gene silencing reveals function diversity of BnaA2.

item.title: BnaA4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaAnn31830D Gene Symbol: BnaA4.BOR2 Gene Name: B efflux transporter Genome: Brassica napus Genome Resources Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaA4.

item.title: BnaC4.BOR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC04g21390D Gene Symbol: BnaC4.BOR2 Gene Name: low-B (LB)-inducible Genome: rapeseed genome Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaC4.

item.title: BUZZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bradi3g46007 Gene Symbol: BUZZ Gene Name: Genome: reference Bd21 genome Species: Brachypodium distachyon Functional Descriptions: BUZZ: an essential gene for postinitiation root hair growth and a mediator of root architecture in Brachypodium distachyon.

item.title: CaSRP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaSRP1 Gene Name: stress-related protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Constitutive expression of CaSRP1, a hot pepper small rubber particle protein homolog, resulted in fast growth and improved drought tolerance in transgenic Arabidopsis plants.

item.title: CcARP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CcARP1 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor-related phosphokinase 1 Genome: Species: Cajanus cajan Functional Descriptions: Melatonin-mediated CcARP1 alters F-actin dynamics by phosphorylation of CcADF9 to balance root growth and salt tolerance in pigeon pea.

item.title: CmNRRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmNRRa Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmNRRa, an orthologous gene of OsNRRa that regulates root growth in response to nutrient stress in rice, was identified from Chrysanthemum and its role in flowering time was studied.

item.title: Cr4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb406780 Gene Symbol: Cr4 Gene Name: crinkly4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CsBPC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsBPC2 Gene Name: BASIC PENTACYSTEINE 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsBPC2 knockout reduced cucumber cold tolerance by increasing the chilling injury index, relative electrical conductivity and malondialdehyde (MDA) content and decreasing antioxidant enzyme activity.

item.title: CsUGT84J2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA000239 Gene Symbol: CsUGT84J2 Gene Name: Al-induced glycosyltransferase Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: Found that flavonol glycoside levels in tea roots increased following Al treatment, and the Al-induced UDP glycosyltransferase CsUGT84J2 was involved in this mechanism.

item.title: D5;ZmTPS7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb071070 Gene Symbol: D5 ZmTPS7 ZmTPS44 Gene Name: dwarf plant 5|terpene synthase 7 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: DRO1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os09g26840 RAPdb gene ID: Os09g0439800 Gene Symbol: DRO1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GaJAZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cotton_A_11862 Gene Symbol: GaJAZ1 Gene Name: Genome: Gossypium hirsutum L.

item.title: GhAPX
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhAPX Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Genome Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Root growth of GhAPX-overexpressing Arabidopsis subjected to abiotic stress.

item.title: GhCERP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D02G2021 Gene Symbol: GhCERP Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Inter-species functional analysis of the BR-mediated BES1-CERP-EXPA3 signaling cascade also promotes Arabidopsis root and hypocotyl growth.

item.title: GhEXPA3-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D04G1924 Gene Symbol: GhEXPA3-1 Gene Name: Genome: cotton genome (Gossypium hirsutum, NAU) Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhBES1 directly binds to E-box of GhCERP and regulates the transcription of GhCERP, which further binds to E-box of GhEXPA3-1 to enhance its transcription to promote plant cell elongation.

item.title: GhMKK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK3 Gene Name: Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase 3 (GhMKK3) Functions in Drought Tolerance by Regulating Stomatal Responses and Root Growth.

item.title: GhWRKY17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhWRKY17 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 17 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The Cotton WRKY Transcription Factor GhWRKY17 Functions in Drought and Salt Stress in Transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana Through ABA Signaling and the Modulation of Reactive Oxygen Species Production.

item.title: GmALMT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g147900 Gene Symbol: GmALMT5 Gene Name: aluminum-activated malate transporter 5 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmERF75
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G016500 Gene Symbol: GmERF75 Gene Name: Ethylene-responsive factor gene 75 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The ABA-induced soybean ERF transcription factor gene GmERF75 plays a role in enhancing osmotic stress tolerance in Arabidopsis and soybean.

item.title: GmETO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G197100 Gene Symbol: GmETO1 Gene Name: Ethylene-Overproduction Protein 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Up-regulating GmETO1 improves phosphorus uptake and use efficiency by promoting root growth in soybean.

item.title: GmEXPB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmEXPB2 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmEXPB2, a Cell Wall β-Expansin, Affects Soybean Nodulation through Modifying Root Architecture and Promoting Nodule Formation and Development.

item.title: GmMYB84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G234600 Gene Symbol: GmMYB84 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor 84 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Drought Tolerance Conferred in Soybean (Glycine max.

item.title: GmNMH7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmNMH7 Gene Name: Nodule MADS-box Homologue 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: In situ expression of the GmNMH7 gene is photoperiod-dependent in a unique soybean (Glycine max [L.

item.title: GmNPLa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G244800 Gene Symbol: GmNPLa Gene Name: phosphate starvation-induced transcription factor 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmNPLa was specifically induced by rhizobium inoculation in root hairs.

item.title: GmPHR25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.15g123100 Gene Symbol: GmPHR25 Gene Name: PHOSPHATE STARVATION RESPONSE 25 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g015300 Gene Symbol: GmPIP1|6 Gene Name: plasma membrane intrinsic protein 1|6 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The effects of constitutive overexpression of GmPIP1|6|GmPIP1|6 in soybean was examined under normal and salt stress conditions.

item.title: GmRR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09g040000 Gene Symbol: GmRR1 Gene Name: a soybean type-B Response Regulator 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Soybean type-B response regulator GmRR1 mediates phosphorus uptake and yield by modifying root architecture.

item.title: GmSALT3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma03g32900 Gene Symbol: GmSALT3 Gene Name: cation-proton exchanger protein Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmSAP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSAP5 Gene Name: Stress-associated proteins Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSAP5, a soybean A20/AN1 domain-containing stress-associated protein gene activated by GmAREB3, increases drought stress resistance in soybean by mediating ABA signaling.

item.title: GmYSL7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.11G203400 Gene Symbol: GmYSL7 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYSL7 controls iron uptake, allocation, and cellular response of nodules in soybean.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmYUC2a mediates auxin biosynthesis during root development and nodulation in soybean.

item.title: GmYUC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08g038600 Gene Symbol: GmYUC2a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We analyzed the YUCCA (YUC) gene family of soybean and identified GmYUC2a as an important regulator of auxin biosynthesis that modulates nodulation.

item.title: HvCslF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU2Hr1G042350 Gene Symbol: HvCslF3 Gene Name: cellulose synthase-like F3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The cellulose synthase-like F3 (HvCslF3) gene mediates cell wall polysaccharide synthesis and affects root growth and differentiation in barley.

item.title: HvEXPB7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvEXPB7 Gene Name: β-expansin gene Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvEXPB7, a novel β-expansin gene revealed by the root hair transcriptome of Tibetan wild barley, improves root hair growth under drought stress.

item.title: HvNPF2.12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU3Hr1G092870 Gene Symbol: HvNPF2.12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Convergently selected NPF2.

item.title: HVP10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G028910 Gene Symbol: HVP10 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: This study reveals the molecular mechanism of HVP10 underlying salt tolerance and highlights its potential in improving crop salt tolerance Vacuolar H+-pyrophosphatase HVP10 enhances salt tolerance via promoting Na+ translocation into root vacuoles.

item.title: HvRAF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvRAF Gene Name: root abundant factor Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley ERF-type transcription factor HvRAF confers enhanced pathogen resistance and salt tolerance in Arabidopsis.

item.title: IbEXP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbEXP1 Gene Name: expansin gene Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: The expressions of IbEXP1, IbEXP2 and IbEXPL1 were significantly correlated with the changes in cell wall component content, and were related to the qualitative structure changes.

item.title: IbMYB73
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: itb01g33150.t1 Gene Symbol: IbMYB73 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Description: IbMYB73 targets abscisic acid-responsive IbGER5 to regulate root growth and stress tolerance in sweet potato.

item.title: IbNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: IbNAC1 was constitutively expressed in root tissues and was induced earlier than sporamin following the wounding of leaves.

item.title: IbVP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbVP1 Gene Name: H+-pyrophosphatase 1 Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: H+-pyrophosphatase IbVP1 promotes efficient iron use in sweet potato.

item.title: LaCLE35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lalb_Chr05g0213851 Gene Symbol: LaCLE35 Gene Name: Genome: Species: lupinus albus Functional Descriptions: The LaCLE35 peptide modifies rootlet density and length in cluster roots of white lupin.

item.title: LBL1;rgd1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb264310 Gene Symbol: LBL1 rgd1 Gene Name: ragged seedling1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: LjCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LjSGA_131670.1 Gene Symbol: LjCCD7 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 modulates plant growth, reproduction, senescence, and determinate nodulation in the model legume Lotus japonicus.

item.title: LjMAMI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjMAMI Gene Name: MYB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: An AM-induced, MYB-family gene of Lotus japonicus (LjMAMI) affects root growth in an AM-independent manner.

item.title: LjSYP132b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Lotja Gi3g 1v0190600.1 Gene Symbol: LjSYP132b Gene Name: Genome: L.

item.title: LjSYP32-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LjSYP32-1 Gene Name: Sed5 -like SNARE Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: We identified a Sed5 -like clone LjSYP32-1 which contributes to nodule tissue formation and plant growth in Lotus japonicus.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7D02G501000 Gene Symbol: LRD Gene Name: LATERAL ROOT DENSITY Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: MsDHN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsDHN1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsDHN1 can increase alfalfa tolerance to Al stress via increasing oxalate secretion from root tips, which may involve in the interaction of MsDHN1 with two AQP.

item.title: MsDREB6.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsDREB6.2 Gene Name: Dehydration-responsive element binding factor 6 Genome: apple sequence database (http://genomics.

item.title: MtbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtbHLH1 Gene Name: basic helix loop helix 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtbHLH1, a bHLH transcription factor involved in Medicago truncatula nodule vascular patterning and nodule to plant metabolic exchanges.

item.title: MtCLE12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g079630 Gene Symbol: MtCLE12 Gene Name: CLAVATA3/ESR (CLE)-related protein 12 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Root growth inhibition was detected when MtCLE12 was ectopically expressed in wild-type roots or synthetic CLE12 peptide was applied exogenously.

item.title: MtMOT1.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtMOT1.2 Gene Name: Molybdate Transporter 1.

item.title: MtNAC969
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtNAC969 Gene Name: NAC969 transcription factor Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Over-expression of one of these transcription factors, MtNAC969, induced formation of a shorter and less-branched root system, whereas RNAi-mediated MtNAC969 inactivation promoted lateral root formation.

item.title: MtNFH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr4g116990.1 Gene Symbol: MtNFH1|MtChit5 Gene Name: NOD FACTOR HYDROLASE1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Role of the Nod Factor Hydrolase MtNFH1|MtChit5 in Regulating Nod Factor Levels during Rhizobial Infection and in Mature Nodules of Medicago truncatula.

item.title: MtROP9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtROP9 Gene Name: small G-protein ROP9 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Silencing of the Rac1 GTPase MtROP9 in Medicago truncatula Stimulates Early Mycorrhizal and Oomycete Root Colonizations But Negatively Affects Rhizobial Infection.

item.title: MtRopGEF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr8g030850 Gene Symbol: MtRopGEF2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: Phosphorylation of MtRopGEF2 by LYK3 mediates MtROP activity to regulate rhizobial infection in Medicago truncatula.

item.title: NbRabE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbRabE1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: We characterized the gene expression, subcellular localization, and in vivo functions of a Nicotiana benthamiana small GTPase belonging to the RabE family, designated NbRabE1.

item.title: NtGNL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtGNL1 Gene Name: GNOM-like 1 protein Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: NtGNL1 is involved in embryonic cell division patterning, root elongation, and pollen tube growth in tobacco.

item.title: NtPDR3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtPDR3 Gene Name: pleiotropic drug resistance protein 3 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: The Nicotiana tabacum ABC transporter NtPDR3 secretes O-methylated coumarins in response to iron deficiency.

item.title: PdGNC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G229200 Gene Symbol: PdGNC Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus trichocarpa Functional Descriptions: The GATA transcription factor GNC (PdGNC) plays an important role in photosynthesis and growth in poplar.

item.title: PtPHOR1_1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0007s03730 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_1 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: PtPHOR1_2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: POPTR_0005s05880 Gene Symbol: PtPHOR1_2 Gene Name: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 Genome: Species: Populus tremula x Populus alba Functional Descriptions: PHOTOPERIOD RESPONSE 1 (PHOR1)-like Genes Regulate Shoot/root Growth, Starch Accumulation, and Wood Formation in Populus.

item.title: PuHox52
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuHox52 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuHox52 promotes coordinated uptake of nitrate, phosphate, and iron under nitrogen deficiency in Populus ussuriensis.

item.title: SaVHAc1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SaVHAc1 Gene Name: vacuolar ATPase subunit c1 Genome: Species: Spartina alterniflora Functional Descriptions: Enhanced salt stress tolerance of rice plants expressing a vacuolar H+-ATPase subunit c1 (SaVHAc1) gene from the halophyte grass Spartina alterniflora.

item.title: SbMATE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g043890 Gene Symbol: SbMATE Gene Name: multi-drug and toxic compound extrusion Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: Sugarcane plants constitutively overexpressing the Sorghum bicolor MATE gene (SbMATE) showed improved tolerance to Al when compared to non-transgenic (NT) plants, characterized by sustained root growth and exclusion of aluminum from the root apex based on the result obtained with hematoxylin staining.

item.title: SbPSTOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g006765 Gene Symbol: SbPSTOL1 Gene Name: PHOSPHORUS-STARVATION TOLERANCE1 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: SbPSTOL1 genes colocalized with quantitative trait loci for traits underlying root morphology and dry weight accumulation under low P via linkage mapping.

item.title: SlCyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCyp1 Gene Name: low-temperature-induced cysteine proteinase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Here, we show that, in tomato, translocation of a phloem-mobile cyclophilin, SlCyp1, from a wild-type scion into a mutant rootstock results in restoration of vascular development and lateral root initiation.

item.title: SlUGT75C1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g092500 Gene Symbol: SlUGT75C1 Gene Name: UDP-glycosyltransferase 75C1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlUGT75C1 catalyzes the glucosylation of both ABA and IAA in vitro| SlUGT76E1 can only catalyze the conjugation of ABA| and SlUGT73C4 cannot glycosylate either ABA or IAA.
